These steps outlined are a quick reference on where to begin your study abroad application journey. Instructional videos are provided to highlight how to complete each required document.

Step 1. After logging in, you are now at the homepage for the Study Abroad Application Portal. 

Step 2.  Create your Traveler Profile Builder listed in the ‘Helpful Links’ tab to the right.  This will provide the Study Abroad Office with additional information on how to assist you with your study abroad process. 

Step 3. To apply for your desired study abroad program, go to the top navigation bar and click on ‘Programs’.  This is in between ‘Home’ and ‘My Study Abroad Profile’.    

Step 4. Find the program Application Contract form (i.e.) by looking for the link designated as ‘Biology’ which is for the program Biology in Costa Rica or Business for Business in Jamaica’ etc.  Click on your desired program link in the navigation bar to the left i.e. Biology.

Step 5. Click on the Application Contract titled as ‘Biology in Costa Rica’.

Step 6. Read and review the Application Contract.  Click submit once the application is completed.  NOTE:  If you leave the application without completing the form, the information will not be saved.  In order to complete the application, all required fields must be finalized and submitted.

Step 7. Once the Application Contract is submitted, it will be sent to the Program Director for their approval process.

Step 8.  Once the Application Contract has been completed by the Program Director, the Study Abroad Office and the student will receive a completed copy of the document. 

Step 9.  The student must print the COMPLETED Application Contract and take it to the Bursar Office located in Edgewater Hall (second floor) to make the first study abroad payment.  NOTE:  Students must make their first full payment (i.e. what is designated on the application contract) in order to reserve a spot on the program.  Only applying for the program does not reserve a spot on the program.  Spots are limited so apply soon!

Step 10: After completing the Application Contract, begin the process of completing your Health Clearance Form and a Copy of Your Passport. 

Step 11:  You can continue making your study abroad payments online by following the directions specified in the ‘Helpful Links’ tab bar.  Look for the link ‘How to Make Online Payments’.
